about-description-1: I'm passionate about creating things. No matter whether as a Developer, or Project Manager. I love TEAM work, because when we are united we can easily ship products.
about-description-2: I code step by step, from one version to another. Just like in Scrum methodology. I'm studing at Wrocław University of Technology at the Bachelor's program of Systems Engineering.
about-description-3: Besides IT I love fantasy books and computer games. Especially grand strategy; and RPG's from the polish game studio CD Projekt Red.
wmsdev-description-1: Active programmer, Project Manager and co-president of the WMS_DEV scientific club at Wrocław University of Technology.
wmsdev-description-2: We create web applications for the student community, all based on Scrum and market-leading technologies.
kalkulacja-straczkowe-description-1: Allows for a simple estimation of the costs of growing legumes and potential profits.
kalkulacja-straczkowe-description-2: Click on the icons to see how it works or take a look at the code.
porownywarka-odmian-description-1: By using it you can easily compare various plant varieties of many species. Created for topagrar.pl based on data from COBORU.
porownywarka-odmian-description-2: To see how it works or check the code click on the icons.
